attributes.action: Place limits on the remuneration of employees of failed banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that the UK government should follow the lead of the US administration and place limits on the remuneration of employees of failed banks in receipt of government subsidy specifically:
A cap to be placed on employee salaries.
Payment of all bonuses scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
